column4: So can anyone tell me any better way to deny all connections from an IP space to a machine other than using hosts.deny?  And I mean other than blocking them at the router level as this slows down my routers traversing through the ACLs.
you can use iptables to deny connections but you'd need the ip ranges
is hosts.deny something webserver specific? i think it would be better for iptables to deny ranges than to have the webserver do it
your guess is as good as mine =/
